1.交易所轉帳可能內含手續費，請務必確認數位貨幣實際到帳數量和訂單數量相符，否則: 1. The transfer via Cryptocurrency Exchanges might include transfer fees from your account, please make sure that the actual amount you sent matches the order amount when we received it. Otherwise, we will not be able to add the points to your wallet.
2.美金匯率波動以交易所為主，匯率可能不定時更新。: The U.S. dollar exchange rate will follow the exchange rate table and will be updated periodically.
2.數位貨幣入款需要經過區塊認證確認，可能需要數分鐘或者更久，完成時間並非由本網: 2. Please noted that we are not able to control/determine the transaction completion time. Due to sending digital currency can be nearly instant for low-value transactions, but can take up to an hour, or even days, depending on the value of the digital currency you are sending. The general rule of thumb is to wait for six confirmations, which should take around an hour, before accepting that a bitcoin transaction is final.
3.匯率可能隨時變動中，所有交易以本網站的匯率為準，轉帳後若有變動，將以實際入帳: 3. The exchange rate may change at any time. All transactions are subject to the exchange rate of our website. If there is any change after the transfer, the points will be added based on the exchange rate at the time of the actual posting time. Therefore, it is recommended that to ensure that you totally agree with the current exchange rate, please refresh the page to get the latest exchange rate before depositing.

進到下一步便會出現付款用的QR Code（錢包地址）。該QR Code僅用於本次: Go to the next step and the QR Code (wallet address) for payment will appear. This QR Code is only used for this transaction. The QR Code is valid for 1 hour, but it is recommended that you use the newly generated QR Code for each payment.
匯率可能隨時變動中，所有交易以本網站的匯率為準，打幣後交易期間若有變動，將以實際: Since the exchange rate is constantly changing, all transactions are based on the exchange rate quoted on this site. When the transaction time changes after a deposit is made, game coins will be issued based on the exchange rate in effect at the time of the deposit. Please update the exchange rate once before depositing to verify the real-time exchange rate before proceeding with the deposit.
